text: The Thatcher Perkins Locomotive #147 is an American 4-6-0 type steam locomotive built by the Baltimore and Ohio Railroad in 1863 named after some unknown locomotive Engineer designer during the American Civil War between the Union and the rascist slave state Confederates in America . The locomotive pulled passenger trains and freight trains until 1892 . The locomotive even made appearances in movies in Rock Island Trail (1950 Movie) Raintree County (1957 Movie) in 1957 after World War 2. Today it is still preserved at the Railroad Museum in Baltimore in America since 1892/1893 .
title: Thatcher Perkins (Locomotive)
